thread.title: Boro transfer news: Middlesbrough confirm the signing of exciting Argentinian prospect Pedro Silva Torrejon
thread.title_full: Boro transfer news: Middlesbrough confirm the signing of exciting Argentinian prospect Pedro Silva Torrejon

author: gstonehouse
title: Boro transfer news: Middlesbrough confirm the signing of exciting Argentinian prospect Pedro Silva Torrejon
text:
Boro transfer news: Middlesbrough confirm the signing of exciting Argentinian prospect Pedro Silva Torrejon 
Aitor Karanka's men managed to push through a last-minute deal for Boca Juniors ace BY GARY STONEHOUSE Comments MIDDLESBROUGH have confirmed the signing of exciting Argentinian prospect Pedro Silva Torrejon. 
The North East club managed to push through the paperwork for the deal in the dying minutes of the transfer window on Tuesday. Middlesbrough have confirmed the signing of exciting Argentinian prospect Pedro Silva Torrejon 
Torrejon jetted into Teesside on Thursday and has now begun his six-month loan spell at the Riverside. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Middlesbrough news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
The 20-year-old left-back will join the club’s academy side, and if he impresses for the Under-23s, then Boro have the option to make the move permanent in the summer. 
The switch was actually agreed at the beginning of last month, but red tape held up the move until the last-minute. related articles TV TIMES What TV channel is Chelsea vs Arsenal on, what time is kick-off and what is SunSport’s score prediction? CONTE SPEAKS Antonio Conte faces media ahead of Chelsea derby showdown with rivals Arsenal Isco inferno Barca considering shock move for Isco on free transfer when Real Madrid contract expires in 2018 PREM PREVIEW It’s your weekend form guide, top flight predictions and a 33/1 bet for Man Utd to beat Leicester City 
Boca’s head of youth development Jorge Roffo flew into Boro’s Rockliffe training ground last week as part of talks over a future partnership and helped to resolve the sticking points surrounding the transfer. 
Torrejon has appeared twice for the Buenos Aires giants in the Primera Division this season. Reuters
